Terasu MC does such an incredible job matching Marin's canon facial expressions, particularly in Page 6.
I think it's a good touch to have Marin refer to Gojou as Tatsurou & Bell from Taimanin Yukikaze & DanMachi while she's getting stolen. It showcases her anime knowledge really well.
The "I wuv him" speech is taken directly from what she says about Gojou early on in the manga/anime, very smart move for an NTR.
